# This file is autogenerated
title: experimental_multiOwnerSignRawMessage
description: Overview of the experimental_multiOwnerSignRawMessage method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseSignerClient/experimental_multiOwnerSignRawMessage
---

This will sign a message with the user's private key, without doing any transformations on the message.
For SignMessage or SignTypedData, the caller should hash the message before calling this method and pass
that result here.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### msg

`Hex`
the hex representation of the bytes to sign

### orgId

`string`
specify if signing should happen for solana or ethereum

### orgPublicKey

`string`
specify if signing should happen for solana or ethereum

## Returns

`Promise<Hex>`
the signature over the raw hex
